text: The men's 5000 metres at the 2017 Asian Winter Games was held on 20 February 2017 in Obihiro, Japan. ==Schedule== All times are Japan Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Monday, 20 February 2017 || 14:35 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} == Records == ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=40|Pair !width=250|Athlete !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |- | || 4 || align=left| ||6:24.32|| |- | || 5 || align=left| || 6:29.67 || |- | || 4 || align=left| || 6:31.84 || |- | 4 || 3 || align=left| || 6:40.26|| |- | 5 || 5 || align=left| || 6:41.17 || |- | 6 || 6 || align=left| || 6:41.76 || |- | 7 || 2 || align=left| || 6:48.37 || |- | 8 || 2 || align=left| || 6:48.38|| |- | 9 || 6 || align=left| || 6:50.60 || |- | 10 || 3 || align=left| || 6:55.90 || |- | 11 || 1 || align=left| || 7:44.31 || |} ==References== ==External links== *Results Men 5000
